DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess growth infant feed BabyNes System , compare World Health Organization Reference , first four month life .
DOC.brief_title: Growth Infants Fed With BabyNes System
DOC.criteria: Healthy newborn Full term newborn ( ≥ 37 week gestation ) Birth weight ≥ 2500 g ≤ 4500 g Newborn birth 14 day age time enrollment The newborn 's mother voluntarily elect exclusively formula feed newborn Having obtain his/her signed legal representative 's inform consentHealthy newborn infant Congenital illness malformation may affect normal growth ( especially immunodeficiency ) Newborn whose mother 's BMI abnormal ( < 18.5 > 30kg/m2 ) start pregnancy Newborn whose mother diabetes type1 type2 Newborn whose mother chronic infectious disease Newborn whose parent / caregiver expect comply treatment Newborn currently participate another nutritional interventional clinical trial ( except vaccination study )
